ygData.subject: Necromiter Note
ygData.msgSnippet: I read this at the Necromiter (sp?) site.  The following is a quote, you all may find it interesting.  I totally agree that they need to add it. I m sick of
ygData.messageBody:
I read this at the Necromiter (sp?) site. The following is a quote, you
all may find it interesting. I totally agree that they need to add it. I'm
sick of being KOS and or the unbalance in the game world. Evil cities are a
valuable part to a game like this!

---------------begin quote-----------------


I recently received this interesting note..

I asked for the city of Plaineel, the once planned Necromancer city on
Odus... this is what i got as response from Brad:

We were thinking about adding it in the future (not in the near future,
though). One of the great aspects of a game like this is our ability to keep
adding to it, including zones. (do keep in mind, though, that creating new
zones takes a lot of time and effort).
-Brad

Perhaps we should start a mailing action or some kind of list where every
Necro could enlist themselves so we show more interest to Verant for the
city!

~Naom


---------end quote---------------

Since we're on a mailing list, perhaps we can get all of our Necromancer
charecter names, and mail Varant saying that we _REALLY_ want this city.

=)

~Myskyra / Tunare
